skins.shipDescription: Atlanta-class light cruiser ®C Reno, Hull Number CL-96.
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Reno, an Atlanta-class cruiser of the later Oakland subclass. We've got souped up anti-air power compared to the regular Atlanta-class. We only saw the last bits of the war, but we still fought hard. But I feel really bad about Princeton... Nnng, it's fine! We can do it!
skins.acquisition: You're the Commander? Ahh, I've always wanted to meet you! I mean, aren't people like you basically heroes trying to save the world? Which kind of makes me your sidekick, right? Oh, I'm Reno, part of the Oakland class! It's a pleasure!
skins.login: Commander, today we do our best to save the world. like always!
skins.details: Commander, I'm in a bit of a pickle... I can't get any of the parts for my costume at Akashi's shop... I guess I'll just have to make them myself... Hrm...
skins.secretaryIdle1: You looking at my gear, Commander? If you press this here, it shoots out a light like bzzzzew! And if you press this one, it goes like kshaw ksshhew. And then this one's like...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, I'm in a bind... Well, I guess it's not really that big a deal. It's just, I wasn't able to get this premium figure I've been wanting...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Woooww.... Hm? Oh, was I bothering you? I was just basking in the amazing feeling of a sidekick watching her hero work up close~
skins.secretaryTouch: I'm doing good work...? Oooh! My hero complimented me! Of course my face is gonna turn bright red!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: You think they're big too? They really get in the way...

skins.shipDescription: This really is a huge clash of all the biggest names from all the factions. It's one exciting match after another! I gotta cheer my hardest too. Eagle Union, go get 'em!
skins.acquisition: This really is a huge clash of all the biggest names from all the factions. It's one exciting match after another! I gotta cheer my hardest too. Eagle Union, go get 'em!
skins.login: Commander, I got a great view of the games from here. Come watch with me~
skins.details: Craven was supposed to be cheer squad leader on account of she's older, but she ended up asking me to do it... I can't let her down. I gotta cheer hard!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Ah, it's half time. That means we better get out there and cheer! Everybody ready? Let's get their blood pumping!
skins.secretaryIdle2: None of the other factions have serious cheerleaders like me or Craven. But I won't underestimate the ones they came up with either... I can't let them beat me~
skins.secretaryIdle3: Look at them out there on the field, shining like superheroes as they fight for victory... being a cheerleader sure is amazing!
skins.secretaryTouch: Huh, you brought me water, Commander? Woaaahhh, no way...! Nng, my hero brought me water... I couldn't be happier...

skins.shipDescription: "Superhero spin-off! The superhero who saved the world is enjoying a hard-earned vacation on the afternoon beach with the sidekick!" ... Hehe, Commander, a tagline like that sounds pretty cool, doesn't it?
skins.acquisition: "Superhero spin-off! The superhero who saved the world is enjoying a hard-earned vacation on the afternoon beach with the sidekick!" ... Hehe, Commander, a tagline like that sounds pretty cool, doesn't it?
skins.login: *Click!* Welcome back, Commander! Heehee~ I couldn't stop myself from taking a picture of my beloved hero enjoying the beach!
skins.details: It was really hard to find a swimsuit that would fit my bust... Luckily, I was able to find this swimsuit at the last minute! It fits my chest perfectly, but... my poor hips are chafing... Ow...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Looks like everyone's pumped up for the beach volleyball tournament! If only my... weren't so big. They make it hard to move around...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Oh yeah. How dashing does My Hero look when swimming? Do you zoom by others while going at 100 miles per hour? Hehehe~
skins.secretaryIdle3: If you compete in the tournament, I'll cheer you on with all I've got! Go! Go! Come on! You can do it! M-Y-H-E-R-O!
skins.secretaryTouch: If it isn't coconut milk! Is it okay to accept such a precious gift? ...Hehe. I'm absolutely elated to receive a precious present from my hero!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Woah?! I-If you touch it like that, it's going to snap!!
